nodes.text: Red Seven was the callsign used by the seventh member of Red Squadron.
During the Galactic Civil War, Cadet Harb Binli flew as Red Seven during the Battle of Scarif.
Later on, an unidentified Rebel pilot flew as Red Seven for the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the battle of Yavin. He was later killed during the battle.
During the hijacking of the Harbinger, another rebel pilot flew as Red Seven.
